title: Quincy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Each night, you may shoot one person. This has a 50% chance of missing.
-After you get one kill with this, the chance of missing goes down to 25%.
-After you get two kills with this, the chance of missing goes down to 0%.
-After you get 3 kills with this, you may rapid fire, shooting 5 people. Each with a 50% chance of missing(Two Uses)
-After you get 5 kills as Quincy, you may arrow storm, attacking everybody in the game. Every shot has a 50% chance of missing(Single Use).
-If you get 7 kills before you use this ability, your chance of missing goes down to 30%

desc:
Post 3138
*Are you kidding me? Nothing gets past my bow!*
